sentences.en: a little boy who wet his bed with monotonous regularity
sentences.cn: 一个老是尿床的小男孩

sentences.en: Aircraft passed overhead with monotonous regularity .
sentences.cn: 飞机一次又一次反复从头顶飞过。

sentences.en: Closures and job losses are again being announced with monotonous regularity.
sentences.cn: 倒闭和失业的消息又在一次次地反复宣布着。

sentences.en: His care to subdue his voice made It'sound monotonous.
sentences.cn: 他故意把声音压得很低,听起来十分单调.
我发现这个工作枯燥无味.

sentences.en: It was like my own marsh country, flat and monotonous.
sentences.cn: 这地方很象我故乡的沼地,景色单调, 索然无趣.

sentences.en: It's monotonous work, like most factory jobs.
sentences.cn: 与工厂大部分工作一样，这份工作也很单调乏味。

sentences.en: Our lives were absolutely monotonous and uneventful.
She thought life in the small town was monotonous.
sentences.cn: 她觉得小镇上的生活单调而乏味.

sentences.en: The crickets stridulated their everlasting monotonous meaningful note.
sentences.cn: 蟋蟀发出了它们持久的,单调而有意思的调子.

sentences.en: The days connecting these seasons are monotonous.
sentences.cn: 这两个季节之间的日子是非常单调的.

sentences.en: The explorers lived on a monotonous diet of beans and rice.
sentences.cn: 探险者靠吃豆子和米饭这些单调的食物为生.

sentences.en: The food may get a bit monotonous, but there'll be enough of it.
sentences.cn: 饭菜可能会有些单一，但管够。

sentences.en: The preacher's monotonous voice put me to sleep.
sentences.cn: 传教士单调的声音催我入眠.

sentences.en: The same old favorites recur year in year out with monotonous regularity.
sentences.cn: 相同的决心以单调的规律年复一年地出现.

sentences.en: The streets were strangely quiet, with only a monotonous, aggravating clanging sounding from the blacksmiths'forges.
sentences.cn: 街上异常的清静, 只有铜铁铺里发出使人焦躁的一些单调的叮叮当当.

words.tran_cn: 单调的；无变化的；产生单音调的

trans.tran_cn: （声音，话语）单调的，无抑扬顿挫的，枯燥无味的
trans.tran_en: boring because of always being the same
